title: T204 Ramly Joe Dunn SGC 30 Lionel Carter Coll.
author: sb1

posts.post_title: T204 Ramly Joe Dunn SGC 30 Lionel Carter Coll.
posts.post_content: Have a T204 Ramly Joe Dunn, Brooklyn SGC 30 from the Lionel Carter collection. Great image, has a crease at the bottom which shows mainly on the back. One of the toughest T204 commons, SGC has only graded six in all grades. $300 delivered.
